title: How I visualise ranked
body:
So I'm lv 30 and I got 120~ wins or so. My friend has about the same wins. He started playing league later than me but he jumped into ranked and now he's gold IV.  So that got me wondering if I should try ranked. 

How I visualise ranked:
1. Serious form of normals
2. More trolls and ragers and toxic players
3. If you make a mistake there's gonna be that one player who starts raging. They'll call you noob and go play bots etc 

THEN, I watched bronze moments on Machinimarealm and I don't know if ranked is more overrated than I thought. On one hand, I'm wondering if I play ranked I'll breeze through it. On the other hand, I'm thinking I'm a really bad player and if I try ranked I'm gonna lose every placement match (is that the term? I'm also not familiar with the system). 

Anyone who has experience playing ranked please tell me what's it really like

replies.body:
* First off, don't be scared to try to play ranked, but make sure you are comfortable too, I would advise not going straight into ranked and getting more familiar with the game
* Try to get a position you are comfortable with and a champion suited to that position
* You get matched up with people of your skill level (Everyone thinks they are better than each other)
* It does have a lot more ragers and toxic players, but that is because people want to get to a higher rank unlike normals. If you encounter these people don't bother and just mute them.
* Lastly have fun :) feel free to add me in game if you want some tips
-Artic

1. Serious form of normals <- kinda tru
2. More trolls and ragers and toxic players <- only tru if u play bad nearly every game 
3. If you make a mistake there's gonna be that one player who starts raging. They'll call you noob and go play bots etc <- this happens when you do dum stuff like not ward and die 5 times to ganks or dont get a qss even after ww has ulted you 52 times
